sourcesContent:
import { Component, inject, signal } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { TranslationService } from '../services/translation.service'; import { AppwriteService } from '../services/appwrite.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, FormsModule], template: `

{{ ts.t().contact.title }}

{{ ts.t().contact.description }}

location_on

{{ ts.t().contact.addressTitle }}

{{ ts.t().contact.addressValue }}

email

{{ ts.t().contact.emailTitle }}

info@cela.org.ua

Ми в соцмережах

play_arrow facebook work photo_camera

{{ ts.t().contact.formTitle }}

Заповніть форму, і наші експерти зв'яжуться з вами.

@if (status() === 'success') {
✅ {{ ts.t().contact.form.success }}
} @if (status() === 'error') {
❌ Сталася помилка. Спробуйте пізніше.
}
` }) export class ContactComponent { ts = inject(TranslationService); appwrite = inject(AppwriteService); formData = { name: '', email: '', message: '' }; isSubmitting = signal(false); status = signal<'idle' | 'success' | 'error'>('idle'); async onSubmit() { if (!this.formData.name || !this.formData.email || !this.formData.message) return; this.isSubmitting.set(true); this.status.set('idle'); try { await this.appwrite.sendRequest(this.formData); this.status.set('success'); this.formData = { name: '', email: '', message: '' }; setTimeout(() => this.status.set('idle'), 5000); }
